original_title: SLPP can win any election: Johnston
original_body_lines: The SLPP can win any election as it has reorganised itself in more than 70 percent of electorates, former Minister and MP Johnston Fernando said.

"Many said that SLPP members will not be able to go to the electorates once again. This was the ideology held by many after we were attacked last year. However we have been able to reorganise ourselves in more than 70 percent of the electorates," the MP said during an SLPP Bala Mandala meeting at Polgahawela.

"The SLPP will win the Kurunegala District by a majority of more than 200,000. Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa will record the largest number of preferential votes. At least 11 SLPP members will go to Parliament from the Kurunegala District. We are ready for any election," he added.
